file_content.text: Outsider. A victory well-earned. My vision nears completion.
Enough games. You're going to explain everything to me right now.
Tell me what's going on.
Way to stand off in the corner during the battle. Thanks a lot.
You didn't even help us fight!
Not so fast. I need proof that you're on my side.
I still don't trust you.
Forgive his tone, honored one. He does not understand our ways.
Forgive her tone, honored one. She does not understand our ways.
Explanation is warranted. Fulminiss corrupted the healing ritual. Created a madness plague. Planned to infect all Voss.
Billions die savage, brutal deaths. Slaughter consumes the entire planet. Needed Sel-Makor's aid.
I assume your actions have been guided by one of your visions.
You foresaw all this.
Is he some kind of spirit or something?
What is Sel-Makor, exactly?
He never would have gotten this far without you guiding him every step of the way.
And yours. Why'd you help him?
I dreamt of the Dark Heart. Secrets revealed. The core is alive. Intelligent. A being of pure evil. Will without a body. Sel-Makor.
Unchecked, corruption will spread beyond the Nightmare Lands. Sel-Makor must be destroyed. If not, Voss will be consumed.
I accompanied Fulminiss so Tala-Reh would follow. Only she can destroy Sel-Makor.
Fool. Sel-Makor is death. Darkness. No Voss can destroy.
I will help her.
She's not in this alone.
What's my role in all this?
So why am I here?
If anyone has the power to destroy Sel-Makor, it's me.
I'm stronger than Tala-Reh.
Your part is done. Claimed the maps from Gorma-Koss. Defeated Fulminiss. Tala-Reh would not be here without you.
Honored one, tell me what I must do.
Descend the steps into the maw of Sel-Makor. Confront the evil within. Destroy it. Cleanse Voss.
You will not survive. Sacrifice will herald a millennium of peace between Voss and Gormak. Thus is my vision fulfilled.
You can't ask her to give up her life!
No! This isn't right!
You're asking Tala-Reh to make the ultimate sacrifice.
A high price to pay.
You heard the Mystic, Tala-Reh. Into the maw.
Sounds good. Let's do it.
This is my destiny. My actions will save all of Voss.
No! Violation. Defilement. Extinction. This must not be!
Jedi. Cast the Mystic into the maw. Rewards. Power. Sel-Makor offers them to you. Like the one who came before.
You are a being of pure evil. You must be destroyed.
No! I won't deal with you!
Hurry, Tala-Reh. Time grows short.
You're throwing your life away.
This is stupid.
Who are you talking about? Was there someone here before Fulminiss?
The one who came before?
Decades ago. A Sith. Greater than Fulminiss. Deals were made. Power was given.
That's an interesting offer...
Rewards and power sound good.
No! We must honor Valen-Da's vision! I will enter the maw. The Mystics are never wrong.
Valen-Da, did you actually see Tala-Reh enter the maw in your vision?
Let me go instead!
The vision ended as we stand now. Fulminiss felled by your hand. We three standing on the precipice. One must descend to destroy Sel-Makor.
I respect your decision, Tala-Reh. I won't interfere.
You're right. It has to be.
I serve the will of the Mystics. As did my husband. Our names will be joined forever in song.
No! Die! Despair! Suffer! Rahrr! Argh! Aaaaah!
It is done. Tala-Reh's sacrifice heralds a new age of peace for this world.
Thank you, outsider. You acted with the devotion of a Voss.
You better spread the story of what happened here to every corner of this world. Tala-Reh deserves that much at least.
Make sure she's remembered.
Poems will be written. Families will sing her praises. She will be honored.
My actions were guided by my own decisions, not some prophecy.
I did what I thought was best.
Motivations irrelevant. Vision came to pass. Fulminiss defeated. Sel-Makor destroyed.
You used her. You manipulate the other Voss into doing whatever you want.
You Mystics sicken me.
Outsiders cannot understand. My vision guided all Voss to a better world.
I don't even want to look at you anymore.
Get out of here.
You've left a mountain of bodies. Healers. Commandos. Innocent and guilty alike.
You don't feel any regret?
Lives were lost. Many more were saved.
I return to Voss-Ka. Goodbye, outsider.
There's too much blood on your hands for me to let you live.
[Kill the Mystic.]
No!
Maybe the Mystics aren't so infallible.
Surprised he didn't see that coming. Some Mystic.
Great, what did that solve? Just made a hell of a mess.
I think the corruption of this place is affecting you...how could you?
T7 = surprised // Jedi = excessive violence
Just testing a theory. If the Mystics are infallible, he should have seen it coming.
What, you didn't see that coming? Some Mystic.
Guess there's always a first time.
[Shove Valen-Da into the maw.]
Aaaaah!
Suffering. Torment. Anguish. Death.
No! No!
Jedi! You survived!
Sel-Makor is destroyed. This heralds a new age of peace. As my vision foretold.
You wanted Tala-Reh to sacrifice herself, but the only reason this worked out was because I took control.
Your vision needed my help.
Your vision was wrong. You said it was Tala-Reh who had to enter the maw.
You're changing your story.
The vision was true. Three standing on the precipice. One to enter the maw and destroy Sel-Makor.
But you assumed it was Tala-Reh who had to enter. You almost blew the whole thing.
I see how you Mystics work. You wait to see how things pan out, then claim that's what you meant to happen. It's just a parlor trick.
You're a fraud.
No trick. The vision was true. Three standing on the precipice. One to enter the maw and destroy Sel-Makor.
Tala-Reh's death was not foreseen. I named her a sacrifice. Acting out my part as foretold. Even Mystics are bound by our visions.
The end result is what matters. My thanks, outsider. No Voss could have done better.
Sel-Makor had to be destroyed, and Fulminiss had to be stopped.
Just doing my job.
Is someone going to write a poem celebrating what I did here?
Will I get my own song now?
You are a hero. Worthy of praise. The Voss will sing the glory of your name.
None of your people had the strength to stop Sel-Makor.
A Voss would have failed.
You speak truth. The Voss are in your debt.
Tala-Reh. We return to Voss-Ka.
Yes, honored one.
Outsider. Jedi. I go now. I would like to speak again.
Where should we meet?
I'd like that.
Do you have something you need to say?
What's this about?
Not here. I need time to... think.
Meet me at the Alien Enclave. Outside Voss-Ka.
I think she likes you. Never really thought of the Voss in that way, but I can see the appeal.
I shouldn't jump to conclusions--but I don't like where this is going.
I don't think we have anything left to say to each other.
That's not a good idea.
Oh. I see. Goodbye then, outsider.
Thank you, outsider. The Voss are forever in your debt.
So, send me in her place. Maybe I can destroy Sel-Makor and survive.
That is a possible interpretation. You show wisdom, outsider.
Descend the steps. Enter the maw. Confront Sel-Makor. We will not interfere.
